ygData.subject: Brewing
ygData.msgSnippet: As part of my RP I thought I would take on this trade. Though it nets no real cash to speak of, I thought what the hell. I have some thoughts/questions: 1.
ygData.messageBody:
As part of my RP I thought I would take on this trade. Though it nets no
real cash to speak of, I thought what the hell. I have some
thoughts/questions:

1. Bards should inherently be good at this skill and maybe should have bard
only recipes or something.

2. AND THIS IS A RANT...why the hell are there no recipes for taking the
skill past 135? I tire of the "not yet implemented" excuse. Grrr....we are
still in beta if something like a trade skill is not complete. RANT COMPLETE

3. What is the recipe for Bog Juice? Surely some fellow bards have taken up
brewing. And while I have brewed everything and searched high and low for
this recipe I cannot find it...though I hear the quest for this is broken
too. grrr

4. Did 19 prove to be a difficult level for you that made it passed? I seem
to be wallowing in low 19.

Thanks
Cleaver, Fennin Ro
